about_the_game:
Step in the shoes of Tabu the sultan with his magical bouncy sword and overcome various traps and challenges. With practice you'll be able to jump, swing, climb and reach new places. Finishing this game won't be easy! Do you think you have it in you to go all the way?

Play the demo which contains the first part of the game for free now!

Key Features

  • Test Your Skills!
  • Feel new types of frustration, anger and euphoria you didn't know you were capable of.
  • Become better with each attempt!
  • Become the best sultan in the leaderboards!
  • This game has no save option! Finish or die trying.
  • 4 game modes, each more challenging!
  • Beautiful scenery.
  • Full of different type of traps to challenge you.
  • Challenge yourself by finishing the game in one go.

Discord

name: Trouble of Tabu Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio

short_description: Take up the challenge and aim your sword to the ground in this true precision platformer. Struggle through the various challenges and try to finish the game in one go.
